Name Type Description

# Mixins

# styles() mixin

Meta
  • File: base/_color.scss
  • Group: base
  • Type: mixin
  • Lines (comment range): 8-8
  • Lines (code): 10-13

Prints color-context styles as base classes (top of stylesheet)

# set() mixin

Meta
  • File: base/_elements.scss
  • Group: base
  • Type: mixin
  • Lines (comment range): 23-26
  • Lines (code): 27-29

Change modules $config

# Examples

General example, replace module-name with module's name

@include module-name.set(( "property" : value ));

# Parameters

Name Type Description
$changes Map Map of changes

# base-styles() mixin

Meta
  • File: base/_index.scss
  • Group: base
  • Type: mixin
  • Lines (comment range): 31-35
  • Lines (code): 37-61

Prints all Base styles

# Examples

@include ulu.base-styles();

# Parameters

Name Type Description
$includes List A list of changes to this module's includes

# base-normalize-styles() mixin

Meta
  • File: base/_normalize.scss
  • Group: base
  • Type: mixin
  • Lines (comment range): 9-13
  • Lines (code): 15-316

Prints the normalize stylesheet. We are using modern-normalize 1.1.0

# Examples

@include ulu.base-normalize-styles();

# Related Links

  • Modern Normalize (NPM) (opens new window)

# base-typography-styles() mixin

Meta
  • File: base/_typography.scss
  • Group: base
  • Type: mixin
  • Lines (comment range): 10-20
  • Lines (code): 22-42

Prints elements base styles

# Examples

@include ulu.base-typography-styles();

Example of type size as base unprefixed

<span class="h1">A</span>
<span class="h2">A</span>
<span class="h3">A</span>
<span class="h4">A</span>
<span class="h5">A</span>
<span class="h6">A</span>
